message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that there is a line item called "Administrative Expenses" with an amount of 738427.41. This represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity.

In the example provided, the solution was to extract the value of "Administrative Expenses", which was 1425164.20. Following the same approach for our problem, I should extract the value of "Administrative Expenses" which is 738427.41.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '738427.41'} }
```
